nodes.text: Amir D'Vail was a male individual who operated House D'Vails, a merchant house that was based in the city Taggon on the planet Druckenwell. D'Vail was friends with the Rodian trader Renna and in about 21 BBY, he placed an order with Renna's Transport Service to take delivery of a cargo of Naescorcom thermal detonators.
